TopicTitle: How do i make and setup a company.

Articles.Content:
It like the one sthat build for requests and make rockets etc..

Edited April 5, 2015 by Djslime6764

Welcome aboard, Djslime6764!

Anyone can start a company. Just go here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/52-Rocket-Builders and start a thread for yourself. Ideally you'd have a catchy name for your company, some sort of logo, and a few craft to share.
Companies are just for fun and have no official standing with the Forum or with Squad.
Thxs so much. I started it up and now i have one!!!!
